original: The Target gets the Marked Condition which confers a -2 penalty to Dodge for the rest of the encounter
The character makes a ranged attack
If that attack is successful, they may make another, free attack
Perform an attack that pushes your opponent back one square if successfull
You gain the ability to hide whilst in Combat
Attacking whilst hidden triggers the Backstab attack
Allows the character to perform Backstab Attacks against voulnerable targets
Disengaging from Melee does not cause your turn to end
Swapping Places with allies not longer causes your Turn to end
Allows the character to begin studying schools of spellcasting
To learn spells, pick and invest in one or more such schools
Doubles the chance of recovering a spent arrow after combat
While wielding a shield, get a dodge bonus for adjacent allies
Bonus is +1 per ally up to a maximum of the Phalanx Bonus attribute value (typically
You can use Ranged Weapons even when in Melee
The first time you take Wound Hit point Damage each combat, you automatically regain 30-40 Attunement Points
When scoring a Backstab hit using a Light Weapon, the targets gets a random injury Condition
Critical Hits with an Axe causes Injury Conditions
Your Critical Hits using Blades cause Bleeding on your target
Scoring a Critical Hit with a Light Blade causes you to restore 1 Attack
If you score a Critical Hit with a Bow, you immediately regain 1 attack
Critical Hits with a Club causes The Injured Leg condition
Dodging a Melee Attack whilst armed causes you to deal a small amont of Slashing Damage to your attacker
Your unarmed attack may cause disease in the target
The gruesomeness of your Axe-Kill causes the Fear condition in all opponents who can see it
Killing an opponent using a Heavy Melee Weapon restores 1 Attack
When killing an Opponent in Armed or Unarmed Melee combat, all Allies who witness the kill get the Inspired Condition for 1 Turn
Killing a Marked Target, heals the party a small amount
When killing a Marked target, all Allies who witness the kill get the Inspired Condition for 1 Turn
Whilst wielding a shield, dodging a melee attack causes you to deal 1-4 Blunt damage to your attacker
Your Charges cause 1-3 additional Blunt Damage
The first time you're Wounded each combat, you automatically hide
The first time you take Wound Hit point Damage each combat, you automatically regain 12-18 Vitality Hit Points
